name: Alan Andrew Varghese

top_projects.name: SmartCanteen
top_projects.description: SmartCanteen is an online system for institutions offering canteen services, featuring standard and personalized options. It tracks users' eating patterns to provide tailored notifications and maintains a Khatta book for users. Admins receive order notifications, helping them identify popular dishes and consider replacing less favored ones.

top_projects.name: javascript-training-projects
top_projects.description: JavaScript projects following the tutorial from freeCodeCamp.org. Link: https://youtu.be/jS4aFq5-91M

alanandrewvarghese/SmartCanteen.summary: Recent activities in the SmartCanteen repository have focused on maintenance and bug fixes, including updates to the dashboard, item quantity validation, and khattabook features. Additionally, improvements have been made to the accounts page, forget password functionality, and minor UI fixes have been implemented. The repository has seen a significant number of push events and a pull request, indicating active development and collaboration.

alanandrewvarghese/power-monitor.summary: The power-monitor repository has seen recent updates to include features such as navigation, hourly reports, and graph updates. Code refactoring has also been performed to improve the overall structure of the project. While the activity is less recent compared to SmartCanteen, the updates suggest ongoing development to enhance the repository's capabilities and user experience.

alanandrewvarghese/flask-portfolio.summary: The flask-portfolio repository has had updates to its portfolio and the integration of Vercel and Tailwind. These updates, although less frequent than in other repositories, indicate efforts to maintain and enhance the project, focusing on its presentation and potentially its deployment and styling.

profile_summary:
Alan Andrew Varghese is a skilled and accomplished developer with a strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, delivering high-quality solutions that drive innovation and growth. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends, he consistently produces cutting-edge code that meets the highest standards of excellence. As a dedicated and results-driven professional, Alan has built a reputation for his technical expertise, collaborative approach, and commitment to delivering exceptional results.

As a seasoned developer with a diverse portfolio of 18 public repositories, Alan has demonstrated his ability to design, develop, and deploy a wide range of applications and solutions. With a growing network of 5 followers, he is recognized as a trusted and influential voice in the development community, known for his expertise in front-end development, web development, and software engineering. By leveraging his technical skills, industry knowledge, and creative vision, Alan continues to push the boundaries of what is possible, driving innovation and delivering value to his clients and the broader development community.
